product_overview: AudioView is a mobile frontend application for streaming and managing movies, supporting robust authentication, responsive UI, accessibility features, and smooth navigation.
core_goals: Provide a seamless and secure user authentication and session management experience.
Deliver a responsive, smooth, and intuitive home screen UI showcasing movies with effective filtering and image handling.
Implement comprehensive search and navigation functionalities with real-time feedback and user-friendly filtering.
Ensure full accessibility support including screen reader compatibility and semantic labeling for visually impaired users.
Maintain robust error handling for network issues and offline states to improve reliability and user trust.
Support user customization through settings including accessibility toggles and network usage preferences.
key_features: Global authentication state management with login/logout and session persistence.
Persistent app layout with responsive sidebar and dynamic navigation based on authentication state.
Home screen featuring categorized movie dashboards with horizontal scrolling chips and image fallback support.
Search functionality with real-time filtering, recommended tags, and empty state UI.
My Page with user profile, watch history, and access control based on authentication.
Settings page featuring accessibility toggles for audio description and closed captioning, network usage preferences, and custom brightness overlay.
Comprehensive UI/UX design supporting multiple screen sizes, themes with dark mode, and consistent text readability.
Error handling with offline notification, network timeout handling, and fallback UI for seamless user guidance.
user_flow_summary: User launches app and authentication state is checked for session persistence.
Authenticated users navigate through home dashboards, select movie categories using horizontal chips, and view movie cards with image fallbacks.
Users can search movies with instant filtering and interact with recommended tags to refine results.
Non-authenticated users attempting to access protected routes are redirected to login screens with appropriate messaging.
Users access My Page to view profile information and watch history, with access control enforced.
Users can customize settings including toggling accessibility features (AD/CC), network usage, and brightness overlay.
App handles offline and network error states gracefully, displaying fallback UI and notifications.
validation_criteria: Successful login and logout with proper auth state changes and error messaging for invalid inputs.
Session persistence verified on app restart maintaining login state.
Responsive layout verified across various screen sizes and device orientations without UI breakage.
Accessibility features tested for screen reader compatibility, semantic labeling, and logical focus order.
Search accuracy and UI feedback validated including empty search results handling.
Offline mode and network error handling confirmed with appropriate user notifications.
Settings toggles correctly save and apply user preferences including accessibility and network options.
UI theme consistency and text readability verified in both light and dark modes.
Smooth home screen scrolling performance without jank or stutter.
Login button disables on click to prevent duplicate requests during authentication processing.
